name: Library of the Accounts of the Dead
name_original: Library of the Accounts of the Dead
description:
Fourth Game-A-Week game of 2023

Library of the Accounts of the Dead is a ~15-minute platformer.

You can wall jump in this one.

This was not what I indended to put out this week! I've been continuing to work on a combat system, but I wasn't happy with anything I could put out using that, so I made this in a day.

Next week's game will have a cat in it.

CONTROLS

Z - Interact/Confirm

X - Cancel/Jump

C - Menu

Arrow Keys - Move
